Open Space – New Timetable

Apr 5, 2016

Here is the new timetable for Open Space! Lots of exciting things coming up and some great discussions.

If you have any questions please do get in touch, or just come along to one of the sessions - all are welcome!

Date Topic
06.04.16 Getting to know your library: Ipswich Library Tour
13.04.16 Speaker: Ele Patrick - Info on Carer’s Assessments Discussion: What is compassion and how can we develop it for ourselves? (Steering Group 3.15 – 4.15)
20.04.16 Discussion & planning: Open Space going forward – have your say: planning session for Open Space
27.04.16 Activity: trip to docks/museum, Orwell Cruise, meal (TBC)
04.05.16 Discussion: What has made you happy or proud or been important you?
11.05.16 Why do some people find it easier than others to share their feelings?
18.05.16 Guest Speaker: Oz Osbourne from The Outsiders (running the 12th Man Project) (Steering Group 3.15 – 4.15)
25.05.16 Activity: trip to docks/museum, Orwell Cruise, meal, speaker (TBC)
01.06.16 Discussion & planning: Open Space going forward – have your say: planning session for Open Space
08.06.16 Discussion workshop: How can we ask for things & say ‘no’ effectively? (part 1)
15.06.16 Discussion workshop: How can we ask for things & say ‘no’ effectively? (part 2)
22.06.16 Activity: trip to docks/museum, Orwell Cruise, meal, speaker (TBC)
29.06.16 Why is it easier to hide the way we feel sometimes and what makes us afraid of sharing? (Steering Group 3.15 – 4.15)
06.07.16 How come so many people aren’t happy with the way they look?
13.07.16 Activity: TBC: Invited Speaker or Meal
